name: Mioka
description:
"The 'Dread' of losing everything"

Mioka is a 17-year-old man who works as a pizza delivery man, he is a lucky guy, he loves his family to the point where he would even sacrifice himself to support them, he hears about a gamble that is worth $1,000,000,000, enough to support his family for decades,  the only fee for this gamble, is his own life.

Music - Socks and RealEfrain

Programmer and Artist - RealEfrain

Socks - Discord: Socks#6697

RealEfrain - Discord: RealEfrain#6559
